channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Vehicle abandoned and untaxed, 15th July
item.description:
Vehicle abandoned and untaxed. Covered with tarpaulin. REG A703RTT

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plawsfield Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic cones - unofficial?, 15th July
item.description:
Six parking spaces have been blocked off on Bickley Crescent since Sunday 9am. There is no indication of any work and there are no safety signs warning drivers not to pull in, risking damage. The cones are unlit. The cones have expanded and now run down to the flats.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bickley Crescent, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tipping on Meadowcourt Road near Canal Walk., 15th July
item.description:
This spot is a popular fly tipping location. I have seen this rubbish increase daily over the past 2 weeks and I am fed up with walking past it when I leave my house. Sadly, some people do not care about others. Please remove it asap. Can a notice be put up on the wall?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Meadowcourt Road, Horn Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet
